price: Na hakika malipo ya Akhera ni bora zaidi, kwa walio amini na wakawa wachamungu.
arabic: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Na malipo yao ya Akhera ni bora zaidi na yanalingana zaidi na hao wanao msadiki Yeye na Mitume wake, na ikawa wanaingojea Siku ya Hisabu na wanaikhofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
